column5: Hey everyone, i just got into float fishing in the fall and have been trolling these boards since.  I have gotten lots of good info and advice from reading all your posts, this is a great community.  I live out in Pickering but have fished all over last fall and hadn't landed anything in about 12 trips.  I had one on at the whirlpool but it snapped my line 20sec after hooking him.  I went out to a local creek on monday and finally landed my first bow! I had another one on shortly after that but he got off.  i did take a picture but it turned out quite poor on my 6yr old phone (mainly because i haven't used it in such bright sunlight and didn't adjust any settings).   I am going out again thursday morning and can hopefully get another with a decent camera on hand  I just want to thank everyone for keeping up such a friendly atmosphere here and hopefully i will be sharing lots in the next few months.
welcome to the bored *cough* umm I mean board lol
welcome and as I'm sure you have read from others "we like pic's".
welcome to the board and look forward to some of your posts.
Welcome to the community AA. Looking forward to reports with lots of "fish porn".
